title: The Quicksilver
description: "“It wasn’t supposed to be like this. This is all too real... time travel is real - irreversible! You can go forward, but you can never go back! We should have listened to him... what have we done?”...the deepest thoughts of Mason Tucker.They found it in the bush and it took them to the Quicksilver.The Quicksilver showed them adventures beyond their wildest dreams... and devastated their lives.Now, Wynter Barnes and his fi ve unlikely companions from Merrick Springs, have more power and responsibility than should ever be given to anyone.Least of all, those so young."
author: Michael C. Madden
